attributes.action: Make it LAW that ALL dog breeds wear MUZZLES and leads at all times when outside
attributes.additional_details:
Dogs are attracted to the weak it's a dominance thing. Proven.
So many people fear walking anywhere out of general fear from dogs. 
Dogs are very Intrusive, and invasive, most dog owners are ignorant and see no harm.
I often feel harassed and alarmed when walking my child to school as all dogs in a field are left off leads and are left to roam, owners often Mile's behind them!
attributes.background: Make it LAW all dog breeds wear leads and muzzles.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petitions which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638225
Require leads, muzzles and licences for all dogs
